messages.message:
Hey all, in the `server-nginx`  Makefile, does anyone know what target we actually use to build the server-nginx image for production? There are many `build-docker-x` targets, and I'm not sure which is the actual production one.

It's definitely not `build-docker` (or, I'd be surprised if it was, since it configures some local jaeger settings and local self-signed certs!)
I’ve been using ‘build-docker-public-aws’ for my own work — that one seems to line up with what we deploy to our AWS sandboxes, but not sure if that’s true everywhere :)
